description: '''Biguine''' ({{IPAc-en|b|ɪ|ˈ|ɡ|ɪ|n}} {{respell|big|IN}}, {{IPA|fr|biɡin|lang}}; {{langx|gcf|label=[[Antillean Creole]]|bigin}}) is a rhythmic dance and music style that originated from [[Saint-Pierre, Martinique]] in the 19th century. It fuses West African traditional music genres, such as [[bélé]], with 19th-century French [[ballroom dance]] steps.
